trial.star_tip_1_1: Tip: Deploy heroes who can make multi-target attacks to clear the stage easily.
trial.star_tip_1_2: Tip: Deploy heroes who can make multi-target attacks to clear the stage easily.
trial.star_tip_2_1: Tip: Prioritize killing Blast Miners to quickly trigger explosions.
trial.star_tip_2_2: Tip: Prioritize killing Blast Miners to quickly trigger explosions.
trial.star_tip_3_1: Tip: Deploy heroes who focus on fewer targets to pass the stage faster.
trial.star_tip_3_2: Tip: Deploy heroes who focus on fewer targets to pass the stage faster.
trial.star_tip_4_1: Tip: Deploy a full team of Support or Tank heroes to clear the stage easily.
trial.star_tip_4_2: Tip: Deploy a full team of Support or Tank heroes to clear the stage easily.
trial.note_trial_out_des_1: Fight skeletons in the mine for lots of Gold.
trial.note_trial_out_des_2: Defeat Corrupt Dioecy to collect Ascension Ores.
trial.note_trial_out_des_3: Smash Crystal Golems to collect Gear Refinement Ores.
trial.note_trial_out_des_4: Free captive souls and get Refined Dust.
trial.note_trial_in_des_2: Increases the ATK of all allies for each Mage deployed. (Up to 3 stacks)
trial.note_trial_in_des_1: Increase the ATK of all allies for each Warrior deployed. (Up to 3 stacks)
trial.note_trial_in_des_3: Allies' basic attacks deal extra damage a few times for each Valkyrie deployed. (Up to 3 stacks)
trial.note_trial_in_des_4: All allies restore HP equal to a percentage of their own ATK each round for each Support deployed. (Up to 3 stacks)
trial.total_dmg_1round: Deal {0} total DMG in a round.
trial.clear_ghost_round_b: Defeat all Souls in {0} rounds to win.
trial.health_keep_percet_b: Maintain your Team's HP >{0}% to win.
trial.total_dmg_1round_b: Deal {1}/{0} total DMG in a round to win.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_11:
Applies Lv.1 Curse to allies. Deploying heroes who can purify Curse or apply buffs to allies is recommended.

Curse: Reduces ATK. Gaining multiple stacks of buffs automatically removes the effect.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_12:
Applies Lv.2 Curse to allies. Deploying heroes who can purify Curse or apply buffs to allies is recommended.

Curse: Reduces ATK. Gaining multiple stacks of buffs automatically removes the effect.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_13:
Applies Lv.3 Curse to allies. Deploying heroes who can purify Curse or apply buffs to allies is recommended.

Curse: Reduces ATK. Gaining multiple stacks of buffs automatically removes the effect.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_14:
Applies Lv.4 Curse to allies. Deploying heroes who can purify Curse or apply buffs to allies is recommended.

Curse: Reduces ATK. Gaining multiple stacks of buffs automatically removes the effect.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_15:
Applies Lv.5 Curse to allies. Deploying heroes who can purify Curse or apply buffs to allies is recommended.

Curse: Reduces ATK. Gaining multiple stacks of buffs automatically removes the effect.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_21:
Applies Bind on 1 ally every 2 rounds. Deploying heroes who can purify Bind or apply debuffs on enemies is recommended.

Bind: Immobilizes the affected unit during the same round that it is applied. Applying multiple stacks of debuffs on enemies automatically dispels the effect.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_22:
Applies Bind on 2 allies every 2 rounds. Deploying heroes who can purify Bind or apply debuffs on enemies is recommended.

Bind: Immobilizes the affected unit during the same round that it is applied. Applying multiple stacks of debuffs on enemies automatically dispels the effect.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_23:
Applies Bind on 3 allies every 2 rounds. Deploying heroes who can purify Bind or apply debuffs on enemies is recommended.

Bind: Immobilizes the affected unit during the same round that it is applied. Applying multiple stacks of debuffs on enemies automatically dispels the effect.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_24:
Applies Bind on 4 allies every 2 rounds. Deploying heroes who can purify Bind or apply debuffs on enemies is recommended.

Bind: Immobilizes the affected unit during the same round that it is applied. Applying multiple stacks of debuffs on enemies automatically dispels the effect.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_25:
Applies Bind on 5 allies every 2 rounds. Deploying heroes who can purify Bind or apply debuffs on enemies is recommended.

Bind: Immobilizes the affected unit during the same round that it is applied. Applying multiple stacks of debuffs on enemies automatically dispels the effect.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_31:
Applies 2 stacks of Holy Armor on enemies every 2 rounds. Deploying heroes who can remove the Holy Armor is recommended.

Holy Armor: Each stack mitigates 1 instance of damage.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_32:
Applies 4 stacks of Holy Armor on enemies every 2 rounds. Deploying heroes who can remove the Holy Armor is recommended.

Holy Armor: Each stack mitigates 1 instance of damage.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_33:
Applies 6 stacks of Holy Armor on enemies every 2 rounds. Deploying heroes who can remove the Holy Armor is recommended.

Holy Armor: Each stack mitigates 1 instance of damage.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_34:
Applies 8 stacks of Holy Armor on enemies every 2 rounds. Deploying heroes who can remove the Holy Armor is recommended.

Holy Armor: Each stack mitigates 1 instance of damage.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_35:
Applies 10 stacks of Holy Armor on enemies every 2 rounds. Deploying heroes who can remove the Holy Armor is recommended.

Holy Armor: Each stack mitigates 1 instance of damage.
trial.note_trial_special_tips_41:
Applies Lv.1 Plague to allies. Deploying heroes who can dispel Plague or apply buffs to allies is recommended.

Plague: Causes a certain amount of HP loss every round. Gaining multiple stacks of buffs automatically removes the effect.

trial.quick_buy_tips: Clear any level in any instance first then you can buy Idle Speed-up
trial.buff_des_1: Deploying 1, 2, or 3 designated heroes increases the ATK and HP of all allies by <color=@000083>[0]</color>/<color=@000083>[1]</color>/<color=@000083>[2]</color> respectively.
trial.buff_des_2: For each hero wearing a specified skin in the team comp, all allies' HP is increased by <color=@000083>[0]</color> (can obtain up to <color=@000083>[1]</color> buff stacks).
